package.name: Smoke_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Author: "This is an Adium message style designed to fit in with the Growl alert style and OS X volume/brightness bezels."
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=4244
